sentences.en: " It is the superpowers that practice hegemonism, sow discord and have got a hand there! "
sentences.cn: 根源 还不是超级大国霸权主义在那里挑拨,在那里插手!

sentences.en: A great deal of discord has arisen in the university over this question.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上,大学里出现了许多不同意见.

sentences.en: A note of discord crept into their relationship.
sentences.cn: 他们的关系出现了裂痕.

sentences.en: Boys seem to suffer more than girls when family discord occurs.
sentences.cn: 家庭不和谐时,男孩似乎比女孩遭受更多痛苦.

sentences.en: Discord between retracement and the underlying pattern generates noise instead of profit.
sentences.cn: 潜在的模式和回撤的不一致会产生噪声而不是利润.

sentences.en: Discord waxed at an alarming rate.
Do I an apple of discord in dawn you few?
sentences.cn: 你问我有么有感想出你们两人之间的不和,是 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do I sense an apple of discord in dawn eager arrive?
sentences.cn: 你问我有无有感觉出你们两人之间的不和,是 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her repetition of these words seemed to strike with some little discord on his ear.
sentences.cn: 她那句说了又说的话,他听来似乎有点刺耳.

sentences.en: The discord of his music was hard on the ear.
sentences.cn: 他演奏的不和谐音很刺耳.

sentences.en: These two answers are in discord.
Through love the universe with constancy makes changes all without discord.
sentences.cn: 通过爱,永恒的宇宙无一例外地改变了一切.

sentences.en: What has brought discord into his family?
sentences.cn: 什么事情使得他家的人争吵?

sentences.en: What's the authorities'attitude towards this discord?
sentences.cn: 当局对这次争端有什么看法?

sentences.en: Where there is discord may we bring harmony.
sentences.cn: 凡是出现不和的地方,我们要为亲善而努力.

words.tran_cn: 不和谐的，刺耳的；不一致的
不一致；不调和；冲突；（声音的）不和谐

phrases.tran_cn: 不和的金苹果；引起不和的争端；不和的种子；祸根（据希腊神话三女神因争金苹果而导致特洛伊战争）

trans.tran_cn: 不一致，不和，〈音〉不协和和弦
